Es un muy buen juego. La jugabilidad es muy interesante y me encantó como me dejó pensando, yo lo describiría como un puzzle revolucionario. Además cuenta con la opción de jugar en cooperativo y su historia es bastante buena.
Прекрасная игра. Очень понравился кооперативный режим, ведь с другом играть куда интереснее, чем одному.) Всем рекомендую приобрести данный шедевр. С нетерпением жду Portal 3!

Look past the brony humour, the dated comic stylings of Stephen Merchant and call backs to memes of 2007 and what do you find?

What we have here is a beta test for technology made for the new generation that never occurred; and let me tell you waiting for a third instalment feels like being an inanimate object floating through space waiting for your lithium battery to finally die out. 

Life after Portal 2 can be compared to the death rattle of Cave Johnson and his last voice messages. The five stages of grief:

SHOCK & DENIAL- Holy Moses I’m a 30 year old man and Valve still hasn't made a third game for any series yet and these loose ends in these stories feel like an unpaid mortgage.

PAIN & GUILT- If only I stopped checking Google every four years to see if Gabe has hinted at releasing a new Half Life.

ANGER & BARGAINING- Fuck this! I'll check some mods. 

"DEPRESSION", REFLECTION, LONELINESS- *Finds the string quartet version of the Portal credits music and remembers his youth*

ACCEPTANCE & HOPE- Well developers are into outsourcing  these days, perhaps Gabe can sell the licences of his games to Obsidan?

When life gives you lemons, you make lemonade. But what is one to do when life gives you two really engaging lemons and the rest of your ingredients for lemonade is still in the mail?

Portal was and always will be a strong beta test for a weapon that intended for use in the next Valve instalments. So the build up is there but much like the Matrix Trilogy you will find yourself confused and angry at where we are today. 

Valve; if you are reading this, whore out your intellectual property to the bright eyed and bushy tailed programmers of tomorrow. Please. 

Your friend, 

Ashman GT 2: Judgement Day.

I saw Portal 2 on sale for -90%, so i decided to buy it. I'm aware of how late i am to the "hypetrain", (pretty much) everyone has played the Portal franchise allready. But i god damn love these games. Of course i had seen countless of pictures, gifs, YouTube videos and such about/related to Portal before, but playing it myself was so much more fun than i thought it would be. If you for somereason haven't played through these games allready, then what are you waiting for?! Go play them right now!  I can say with complete honesty that Portal 2 is a 10/10 for me.
well... duh! You now can throw radios, INTO MORE SENTRY-BOTS! and the moon! ;)
无论从游戏画面还是整体游戏的难度来说都是一流的，把握地很好，很好玩，到后面也越来越考验你的脑力，另外有很多玩家制作的新地图也是这个游戏的一大亮点。反正买就是了，剧情稍微简单了一点。希望还能有续集

Better than the first one! Portal 2 was more than a puzzle game, unlike the first one, it has a more in-depth story, with great voice-acting and characters. Would recommend! A must-play, just like the first one.

Great game and follow up from Portal 1! It challenges your mind and makes you think hard. (at some points, I was stuck in levels because timing and aim must be accurate!). Though it is an old game, the community still makes custom maps which are still fun, overall if you're looking for a good puzzle and story-styled campaign, I recommend you to play this and the first one. Welp abit extra but the coop mode is also pretty good though connections may be bad.

De mis favoritos creados por Valve, con uno de los mejores sountracks en videojuegos, aun conservo la canción 'Want You Gone' de Jonathan Coulton en mi móvil, un juego que expande el universo del Portal 1, con unos puzzles que te quitaran el sueño y te volverán un adicto, con un modo cooperativo buenísimo para trollear y darte unas carcajadas con tus amigos y unos gráficos que con los años me siguen enamorando, estoy ansioso por la tercera entrega si es que no muero antes de que la lancen...
